dict.acceptation: 地点，场所；斑点，污点；[股票]现货；职位，职务；
弄上污渍，弄上斑点；污辱，玷污；认出，发现；散步；
satellite positioning and tracking 卫星定位和跟踪；

sent.orig: SPOT Combined images can be made by multispectral and panchromatic ones in three different ways.
sent.trans: 组合SPOT图像是由多波段和全色波段按三种不同方式组合的。

sent.orig: They call It'sPOT of all things.
TM and SPOT data processing and multiple data fusion methods are discussed in this paper.
sent.trans: 本文介绍了TM和SPOT等多源数据融合处理方法，以及提取蚀变影像信息和增强冻融带影像信息的方法。

sent.orig: Our pearl beauty-care capsule has remarkable effect for yellow-brown spot, sun spot and age spot.
sent.trans: 我们的珍珠美容胶囊对雀斑，晒斑，黄褐斑都有显著效果。

sent.orig: Currently there are two typical spot-beam models with equal beamwidth and equal spot area.
sent.trans: 目前等波束宽度模型和等点波束面积模型是两种常用的点波束模型。
